metadata.title: CVE-2024-45616 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in OpenSC, OpenSC tools, PKCS#11 module,minidriver, and CTK. An attacker could use a crafted USB Device or SmartCard, which would present the system with a specially crafted response toAPDUs.The following problems were caused by insufficient control of the responseAPDU buffer and its length when communicating with the card.

criterions.comment: opensc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
